channel.title: batman.fandom.com on Chege's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in batman.fandom.com on Chege's Blog

item.title: Riddler: Year One
item.description: body { background-image: url('/img/fiction/dano-riddler.jpg'); } The Riddler: Year One. Paul Dano; Stevan Subic. www.dc.com . www.hoopladigital.com . batman.fandom.com . 2023. EDWARD. Do they deserve a chance? How do they go on in a city that tells them day after day that they are fractured and broken… that there is not way out or up? EDWARD. The pieces don’t fit. C’monnn, Edward, think!

item.title: Catwoman: Lonely City (2021 - 2022)
item.description: body { background-image: url('/img/fiction/catwoman-lonely-city.jpg'); } Catwoman: Lonely City. Cliff Chiang. www.dc.com . www.hoopladigital.com . batman.fandom.com . 2021. aims to handle a Gotham without Batman. Maybe there’ll be fewer super-villains as there is no Batman. There’s an arms race between villains and heroes. I expect more systemic villains that skirt legality such that they can’t be imprisoned. Snapshots Middle-aged Catwoman trying to reintegrate into society.
